actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to cancel the registration of 2, 4, 5-T, and any other pesticide containing 2, 3, 7, 8-tetrachlorodibenzo-p-dioxin (TCDD), under the provisions of the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act.

summary.text: Requires the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to cancel the registration of 2,4,5-T and any other pesticide containing 2,3,7,8-tetrachlorodibenzo-p-dioxin (TCDD) under the provisions of the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act.

titles.title: A bill to cancel the registration of 2, 4, 5-T, and any other pesticide containing 2, 3, 7, 8-tetrachlorodibenzo-p-dioxin (TCDD), under the provisions of the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act.
